attr.title: Two Die
attr.desc: Two Die is a turn-based, tactical, roguelike RPG where every action is determined by the roll of two six sided dice and every action requires to spend points. You choose a character out of 3 standard classes (warrior, rogue and mage) and embark on a quest where all encounters will be played through dice rolls.  Battle enemies to upgrade your character and discover what hides in your lost memories.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from Steam and place the exe file into the port folder.
